attributes.action: To Commit to HS2 contiue onwards to The North including Scotland.
attributes.additional_details:
In order to create growth I believe it would be benefital to extend plans to have HS2 committed to the Full Country. I would believe in having both Glasgow and Edinburgh, if the Scottish Parliment wants to extend it then let the money come from the Scottish Parliments budget.

The benefits as far as increasing growth would be extensive if you think of all the apprenticeships that would be created it would aid youth unemployment along with creating needed manual skilled workers something the UK desperately needs.
